title: How to Do Fatalities in Mortal Kombat Karnage

parts.name: Running the Game on Your Browser

steps.headline: Install Adobe Flash Player.
steps.description: You need to have the Adobe Flash Player installed in order to play Mortal Kombat Karnage.

steps.headline: Go to the game’s website.
steps.description:
Open your favorite browser and search for Mortal Kombat Karnage. There are several sites online where you can play the game. Some websites include the following:
https://www.y8.com/games/mortal_kombat_karnage
https://www.silvergames.com/en/mortal-kombat-karnage
https://arcadespot.com/game/mortal-kombat-karnage/

steps.headline: Enable Flash.
steps.description: Most web browsers require you to enable Flash before you can play. When you load the game, the web page will display something alerting you to the fact that you need to enable Flash. Click the alert and then click the pop-up that says Allow or Enable or something similar.

steps.headline: Start the game.
steps.description: Wait for the game to load then click “Start” on the game screen.

steps.headline: Pick Single Player.
steps.description: This is the only available choice in the Beta version of the game.

steps.headline: Select a mode.
steps.description: Arcade mode lets you challenge the playable characters in a series of fights, and Practice mode lets you battle a character to practice your moves.

steps.headline: Pick a character to play   You can pick Noob Siabot, Kitana, Sub Zero, Nightwolf, or Kabal.
steps.description: You can also click the question mark icon to select a random character.

steps.headline: Select a difficulty.
steps.description: Click the arrows at the bottom of the screen to select Easy, Normal, Hard, or Insane. Then click Novie under "Choose Your Destiny" (This is the only option available in the Beta version of the game).

steps.headline: Identify the control keys.
steps.description:
Use the following controls to play the game:
Use the arrow keys on your keyboard to move your character. Press A to punch. Press S to block
Press  D to Kick.

steps.headline: Win two rounds.
steps.description: A match consists of two rounds, and when you bring the opponent to zero health on the final round, a voice will say “Finish Him!” as the opponent is dazed.

steps.headline: Perform a fatality.
steps.description:
Perform the key combinations for a particular character to perform their fatalities. When performed correctly, your fighter will perform a brutal finishing move to dismember, behead, and generally kill the opponent. Each character's finishing move is as follows:

Kabal: Down, Down, Back, Forward, A

Noob Saibot: Forward, Down, Forward, A

Kitana: Down, Down, Down, Down, A

Nightwolf: Forward, Back, Forward, A

Subzero: Forward, Forward, Back, Down, A

steps.headline: Perform a Stage Fatality.
steps.description:
When you get to The Foundry Stage, you can perform a stage fatality. The Foundry is the stage with the lava in the background and the two large circular saws. Make sure your character is in front of the circular saws and do the following stage fatality:

Stage Fatality: Down, Down, Forward, A
